lead_paragraph: Shahid Afridi has given up Pakistan's 20-overs captaincy after the team's poor World Twenty20 campaign in India but wants to play on for his country, the 36-year-old said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Afridi Quits as T20 Captain but Wants to Play On for Pakistan
headline.main: Afridi Quits as T20 Captain but Wants to Play On for Pakistan

snippet: Shahid Afridi has given up Pakistan's 20-overs captaincy after the team's poor World Twenty20 campaign in India but wants to play on for his country, the 36-year-old said on Sunday....
